column1: We cannot get complacent.   The Board of State Canvassers must also certify Michigan's election results. Members Jeannette Bradshaw Julie Matuzak Aaron Van Langevelde & Norm Shinkle have a legal duty to certify the results.

The will of Michigan’s voters will not be overturned.  After tremendous public backlash the Wayne County Board of Canvassers just reversed course and certified its election results. https://t.co/o6KiVXHV6X

Despite this unprecedented partisan gamesmanship the process will move forward. Under state law Michigan voters expect the Board of State of Canvassers to honor the will of the voters and finish the job.

Michigan voters resoundingly chose @JoeBiden. He won our state by nearly 150000 votes––14 times Donald Trump’s 2016 margin.   The two GOP members of the Wayne County Board of Canvassers tonight put partisan politics above their legal duty to certify the election results.

I couldn’t agree more Mr. President-elect. After a hard-fought campaign it’s time for our country to heal unify and get to work on the pressing issues facing America’s families. https://t.co/CWeQmXYZHD
Congratulations to President-elect @JoeBiden and Vice President-elect @KamalaHarris! Joe and Kamala are the leaders America deserves.

Our race was just called—thank you to the people of the Fifth Congressional District for once again placing your trust in me to represent you in Congress.  It is an honor to work every day on behalf of the people in my hometown of Flint and other communities across mid-Michigan. https://t.co/jjuyg6GuHi

In this election like every election in our history the people will decide the outcome. Our state’s leaders know how to administer elections & Michiganders should have confidence that EVERY vote will be counted. We will not let anyone including @POTUS steal this election.
Voters decide the winners in our elections—not the candidates themselves. It is shameful that the president is intentionally misleading voters and seeking to undermine the integrity of our elections.
Polls close at 8 p.m. ET. But if you’re in line to vote stay in line! You can still vote. #ElectionDay
Thanks Laurie! Make sure to vote for my good friend @ElissaSlotkin! https://t.co/fbpl5CnKKg

Polls are open in #Michigan and people are voting! It's amazing to see democracy in action on #ElectionDay.  Thanks to our Team Kildee volunteers who are spread out across the district today! Let's win this! https://t.co/22V5CLZtMD
Michiganders: you can still register to vote today on #ElectionDay!  Head directly to your clerk's office where you can both register and vote in the same visit.  Make a plan: https://t.co/YOkSWtRfAU

It's #ElectionDay! Polls are open now until 8 p.m. ET.   🏛️ Find your polling place  😷 Grab your mask 🗳️ VOTE!   Call our voter assistance hotline at 833-MI-VOTES for all your voting questions. https://t.co/Gao2hiv46V

Proud to be with that woman from Michigan! @GretchenWhitmer's leadership has saved countless lives. We have her back because she has ours.   Let's make sure our Governor has a Democratic State House in Lansing by sending @BrianKElder  & @Sarah4MI to represent us! https://t.co/6c70uyOnXR

Saginaw is ready to VOTE! One more day to make your voice heard.  Vote today by absentee ballot at your clerk's office or make a plan to vote in-person Tuesday on Election Day. https://t.co/YOkSWtRfAU https://t.co/sjVurUuUIO
Great event with young entrepreneurs and @garlin in Saginaw! https://t.co/sPqtHBhMbe
Thank you for your support! https://t.co/P5iIwtWRqb

Back in Bay City with @GaryPeters! We need to re-elect Gary and flip control of the U.S. Senate. Gary shares our values and is one of the most effective & bipartisan voices in the Senate.   In 5 days let's send Gary back to keep fighting for Michigan families. https://t.co/f7tAaNM71B
It's great to have our next First Lady @DrBiden back in #Michigan today!  Five days to change the course of history. Make a plan to vote: https://t.co/YOkSWu8Qss. https://t.co/lcVMdPIdYv
I will always stand with the hardworking men and women who help build this country. Honored to have the support of the Michigan Regional Council of Carpenters and Millwrights! https://t.co/QJ76jgBzF2
One week to go.  Let's do this!  Make a plan to vote: https://t.co/YOkSWtRfAU https://t.co/lHpdfA4pjM
Proud to have the support of @MomsDemand. In Congress I voted for universal background checks to protect our schools churches and communities. https://t.co/gsK7y8ohFh
Bay City is ready to vote! #RidingWithBiden https://t.co/PTi7ZzjgcZ

Launching a canvass kick-off in Midland with my friend @Sarah4MI who is going to help flip the Michigan State House! Sarah Schulz shares our values and I know she will work hard every day for working families across our community. https://t.co/BRHkJfZQ2b

Lots of excitement today in #Flint for the Biden-Harris bus! As @JoeBiden says we are in a fight for the soul of this nation. Let's finish strong & leave nothing to chance.  Make a plan and VOTE. https://t.co/YOkSWtRfAU https://t.co/5pCyACgjXi
@DesolationCay Thanks so much! Can you shoot me an email at campaign@dankildee.com?
Thank you for your support! https://t.co/PdL33PFP4q
This is the Twitter content everyone deserves. https://t.co/HCKTWgNNhM
Excited to welcome @DrBiden to Saginaw!   Watch live: https://t.co/SpuPzby58b

Great to be with Mayor Sheldon Neeley State Representative Cynthia Neeley and Lt. Gov. @Garlin Gilchrist for a get out the vote rally in #Flint! Michiganders are fired up and ready to VOTE. https://t.co/WAf9TmQusk

Great to be in Saginaw with Lt. Gov. @Garlin as we lead a march to the drop box w/ local voters!   Over 1.5 million Michiganders have already voted early by absentee! Learn how you can too: https://t.co/YOkSWtRfAU https://t.co/mJ9DTwAm7g
So cute! https://t.co/m6SlXfLYPb

Amazing to meet 12-year-old Riley on the campaign trail today! He read me an essay he wrote "how kids can change the world." Indeed they can!   Our future is bright with kids like Riley ready to lead. https://t.co/RxhPzW8WsL

Out knocking doors in Pinconning with @Sarah4MI! We need Sarah Schulz in the State Legislature—she shares our values and will fight every day for working families.  Get involved: https://t.co/oZO1dmsbfC https://t.co/7nNdzKAmGR

So many volunteers helping to canvass & talk to voters in the last 17 days before Election Day! Got a chance to present our "Outstanding Volunteer" award to Doug this morning.  Get involved: https://t.co/Rdz03YLkjI https://t.co/kBQJZEWzAZ
Amazing turnout in Flint for our first canvass launch & drive-thru yard sign giveaway! Michigan is ready to elect @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris & Democrats up and down the ticket! https://t.co/3JeBLzYwag

Joining @MIAFLCIO and State Rep. @BrianKElder to discuss how we can boost the wages of Michigan workers and fight for fair trade policies that promote American manufacturing.  Watch live: https://t.co/9pBES8By6l https://t.co/DEYZQzECT6

We stopped by the local clerk's office to drop off our absentee ballots!  In Michigan vote straight-ticket for Democrats and then fill out the non-partisan section to vote for @BridgetMaryMc & @WelchForJustice for Michigan Supreme Court.  Make a plan: https://t.co/YOkSWtRfAU https://t.co/yxargrDGf4

At @IBEW Local 692 in Bay City getting out the vote for State Rep. @BrianKElder!  When we vote Democrats up and down the ballot will win.   Check your voter registration request your absentee ballot or make a plan to vote on Election Day: https://t.co/kasXtbzK1U https://t.co/hWVR8957OA

On the campaign trail with @Garlin Gilchrist and State Rep. @electkennedy20 in Clio! We need to flip the Michigan State House in Lansing.  20 days until Election Day! Nearly 1 million Michiganders have already voted absentee. Have you?   Make a plan: https://t.co/kasXtbzK1U https://t.co/wrUxFnHAzb

.@HillaryScholten knows that clean and affordable drinking water should be a basic human right for ALL.  If we help elect Hillary to Congress I know that she will be a strong ally in the fight to clean up #PFAS chemicals and protect our #GreatLakes.  Join our town hall tonight: https://t.co/8sIUmjO0zv
I hope you can join me tonight at 5 p.m. ET for a Progressives for @JoeBiden virtual phone bank!   RSVP: https://t.co/OchSHfgEAe
Thank you! Honored & grateful to have your support. https://t.co/dtqXmDmq96

As the Dean of Michigan's Democratic congressional delegation I have seen @HaleyLive & @ElissaSlotkin work tirelessly on behalf of working families in their districts. We need to keep them in Congress fighting for Michigan! https://t.co/GX62wFpROC

State Rep. @BrianKElder works hard for Bay County families. He comes from three generations of union workers and knows the value of an honest day's work. We need him to keep fighting for workers and small businesses in the State Legislature.  Get involved: https://t.co/rGmfA7XJNr https://t.co/Bg04tiSzuf

My job title and duties are both the same: representative. I need to hear from all constituents—those who agree & disagree—in order to do my job effectively. I always appreciate your opinion and feedback! https://t.co/wCYYMDf2CV

On the campaign trail w/ Gov. @gretchenwhitmer helping to launch a volunteer canvass in Davison!  We need to keep Rep. Sheryl Kennedy (@electkennedy20) in the State Legislature. She's a lifelong educator & fighter for working families.  Get involved: https://t.co/t9rGvB9udS https://t.co/I0tjZAiUhQ
Thank you so much for your support! It means a lot. https://t.co/EQvdoJwyaR
Michiganders please remember to vote for Supreme Court candidates @BridgetMaryMc & @WelchForJustice! They will be impartial judges on the bench. https://t.co/7n5IY3Nglb
Vote. https://t.co/X2BWcfBPbx
Americans have been voting by mail since the Civil War. Absentee ballots are safe and secure. So much so that @realDonaldTrump himself votes by mail.  Make a plan to vote: https://t.co/kasXtbzK1U

.@JoeBiden recognizes that investing in clean energy technologies including electric vehicles will create good-paying union jobs in America.  Climate change is an urgent national security threat. We must act to protect our jobs Great Lakes and way of life.

It shouldn't be hard to condemn racists and white supremacists. Once again @realDonaldTrump can never rise to the occasion.   He wants to divide the country for his own political benefit. We have to elect @JoeBiden.

President Trump is set to become the first president in generations to have a net job loss during his presidency.  Since January 2017 even before the pandemic Michigan lost over 57000 manufacturing jobs.
.@SenGaryPeters has a record of leadership bipartisanship and ability to get things done.   We need to re-elect Gary Peters to keep him fighting for Michigan. https://t.co/W5NieYBTXy

Peaceful transitions of power are integral to a strong democracy. It is enshrined in our Constitution.  @realDonaldTrump refusing to make this commitment is dangerous and completely disregards the voice of the American people.
Don't just boo. VOTE.  Make a plan 👉🏻 https://t.co/kasXtbzK1U https://t.co/7pFXNxGZ6K

Proud to have earned the @DetroitChamber endorsement! I'll work with anyone—Republicans Independents or Democrats—to create good-paying Michigan jobs and fight for fair trade deals that put our workers first. https://t.co/bm7YSpUo33
The President is simply making things up ahead of an election.  #Michigan has lost manufacturing plants and automotive jobs under @realDonaldTrump. https://t.co/xBkkPjIiBC
We deserve a President who takes this pandemic seriously has a national strategy to protect public health and never lies to the American people. https://t.co/HYEWrJEapk
Powerful.  Inspiring.  Truthful.  Hopeful.  An incredible speech by @JoeBiden clearly laying out what's at stake in 75 days. #DemConvention
Congratulations @JoeBiden! We will work together to restore American leadership expand access to health care and build our economy back better for working families. https://t.co/hyPvgEv0IT
So great to see Michigan’s own @MariManoogian and leaders from across the country highlight the important role young people have in our party. #DNCConvention https://t.co/vWZI5p29SM
Republicans are holding up a second round of stimulus checks hazard pay for frontline workers extended unemployment benefits and funding for our schools. https://t.co/rIaf6RR3og
I'm fired up to elect @JoeBiden as President and @KamalaHarris as Vice President!  84 days to defeat Donald Trump. Let's do this!

.@JoeBiden has a plan to create 1 million auto jobs in America.  Under Donald Trump we had a net loss of auto jobs in Michigan. And now due to his bungling of the pandemic we've lost even more jobs.  The choice is clear in November.  https://t.co/aqu5DSQ0HP

I'm working to elect @JoeBiden because he has a plan to revitalize manufacturing in Michigan and create good-paying jobs so we can #BuildBackBetter.  Join me and @AFLCIO President Richard Trumka for a conversation about Joe's vision for America.  RSVP: https://t.co/nQ8JKVi2ym https://t.co/upbl6y1aw2

It's Election Day Michigan! Make sure to vote.  Polls are open today until 8 p.m. ET.  If you still have an absentee ballot you must drop it off today by 8 p.m. ET for it to count. Find your local clerk's office or a ballot drop box: https://t.co/ccTHrmxOuj
Shameful. https://t.co/LdpbBdvB92

The #Michigan primary is one week from today!   Did you know that you can drop your ballot off at your city or township clerk’s office? Ballots must be received by 8 p.m. ET on Tuesday August 4th.   You can also visit https://t.co/ovajrJmAvb to track the status of your ballot.

We are living through a global pandemic. Now is not the time to cut millions of people off from unemployment insurance who are out of work because of this health and economic crisis. #COVID19  https://t.co/EwWY56op3P
John Lewis dedicated his life to the expansion and protection of the right to vote. We should honor him by restoring the Voting Rights Act.  https://t.co/rXOuYilhMI

Rest in power John Lewis. Thank you for always encouraging us to get into 'good trouble'. I'll always cherish the memories serving with you in Congress and being able to call you a friend. https://t.co/UfBIfSmKiD

Dr. Fauci graduated top in his class at Cornell University Medical College and has advised six presidents Republicans and Democrats.  @realDonaldTrump reportedly paid someone to take his SATs and suggested Americans inject themselves with bleach.  I know who I trust.
We should be proud of how far our country has come but not complacent in thinking that we have done enough.   Let's always fight for a more just equal society.

Tonight marks our critical FEC reporting deadline.  If you're able pitch in to help our people-powered campaign reach voters across Michigan's Fifth Congressional District. Every donation counts!  Pitch in today: https://t.co/cKN2YT5LpE https://t.co/OKXseHoChK
Wear a mask https://t.co/saGqCrdbeI

No one should go hungry in the richest country in the world including in a pandemic. I'm working to expand access to successful food programs like Michigan's "Double Up Food Bucks" to give people greater purchasing power and access to fresh foods. https://t.co/3onZsu5yRy

I am pleased to see Ontario Power Generation abandon its plans to build a nuclear waste storage site in Kincardine less than half a mile from the shores of Lake Huron. This is a huge victory for protecting the Great Lakes and our economy. https://t.co/R7g6GdYv6p
#JuneteenthDay and every day is a great day to support Black-owned small businesses in our community. @MLive has put together a searchable list of businesses near you: https://t.co/x58rgD4RAI

On #JUNETEENTH2020 we commemorate the end of slavery in the United States. 155 years later today is also a reminder that Black Americans still face systemic racism and oppression. I will continue to join those in the streets peacefully speaking out for justice and equality.

Thank you #SCOTUS! This decision is a big step in the right direction.   But let's remember that the House passed the #DreamAct over a year ago to provide permanent protection to DREAMers—yet the @senatemajldr still is blocking a vote in the Senate. https://t.co/DmgUITFmZK

Happy #PrideMonth! We have witnessed great strides towards LGBTQ equality in recent years but the fight continues. No one should live in fear because of who they love or how they identify. My daughter Katy and I enjoyed Flint Pride last year https://t.co/T8DMC1Az5k

Congratulations to Logan Murray of Flint's @PCHS_AD on committing to play football at Michigan State University. I may cheer "Go Blue!" but I am very proud to represent hardworking future @MSU_Football Spartans like yourself. Best of luck! https://t.co/ck2L6bvfao

As people continue to deal with the impact of the #coronavirus they shouldn't have to worry about losing access to water. Now is not the time for obscenely high water bills and water shut offs especially for those who were already struggling the hardest. https://t.co/2dYwwv7O2b

For my hometown of Flint the #coronavirus pandemic represents a crisis on top of the crisis. We must do more to help families weather this pandemic especially the most vulnerable. https://t.co/brbDZ8UYk7

Brave young men and women have consistently risen to the challenge of protecting our freedoms. Many have paid the ultimate price in defense of the values we cherish. On #MemorialDay let us be grateful for those who have given their life in service to our nation. https://t.co/tgOiL8Zkh3

During times of crisis America has persevered when we stood together. Now is not the time for partisanship in the middle of a global pandemic. For us to get through this we must remember that the enemy is the #coronavirus not each other. https://t.co/c6kwQcmNZP

Thank you @Rihanna @BigSean & everyone who are fighting #COVID19. Communities of color are disproportionately hit the hardest by the coronavirus. Cities like Flint & Detroit greatly benefit from this help but we must continue to push for further relief. https://t.co/smtbC5v9JI

There has been a racial disparity in health outcomes in this country for a long time. That's why I'm fighting alongside fellow Dems to get help from the fed gov for minority communities like Flint that #COVID19 is disproportionately sickening. https://t.co/wPUngOryhD

#COVIDー19 rips the cover off the inequities in our society. Flint was already reeling from a water crisis. We must recognize that part of the resolution of this crisis is to right some of the past wrongs of inequity in places like Flint and Detroit https://t.co/xWzItYGghj
Celebrate #nationalbeerday today as well as a Flint small business by visiting my friends at @tenacitybrewing. They’re still open for take out and could use our support.

I am deeply saddened by the news that my friend Ruben Burks the first African-American @UAW secretary-treasurer passed away Monday. He was a tireless fighter for the working families of America. My condolences go out to his family and to everyone whose life was touched by Ruben
It's so great to see @MI_Dems State Rep. Tyrone Carter on @cnn a moment ago looking strong as he recovers from #COVID19.

Michiganders it's time to vote! Make your voice heard & help decide who our Democratic nominee will be for President! Remember: →Polls open until 8 p.m. ET  →You can register to vote same-day at your clerk's office.  →Problems? Call 833-MI-VOTES  #ElectionDay #MichiganPrimary
Packed house tonight at the Bay County Democratic Party annual dinner! People are ready to work and elect Democrats up and down the ballot. https://t.co/ffJ0c93Xlt
Since Dr. King was taken from us Americans continue to celebrate his legacy by volunteering in their communities.   This #MLKday give back near you: https://t.co/0O6Nh3OQCm #DayOn
